name: test_e2e_with_logs[070_SQLI_ERROR_013]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_013` |
| **Name** | PostgreSQL generate_series resource exhaustion |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT * FROM generate_series(1,1000000)) --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20generate_series%281%2C1000000%29%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~12000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:54:36.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_013-1769864076846-fg14lv pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_013 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20generate_series%281%2C1000000%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_013-1769864076846-fg14lv pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_013 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20generate_series%281%2C1000000%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
12:54:36.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_013-1769864076846-fg14lv pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_013 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20generate_series%281%2C1000000%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
